about_the_game:
It stands at the end of the world, above the once great lands... What was a monument to the gods is now a twisted place of ruin and despair, ruled by the tyrannical Usurper. He and his spawn ravage and plunder whatever they can reach, emboldened by the Tower's powers.

So many have tried to conquer the Tower. Brave warriors on their heroic quests; robbers, on a hunt for treasures and artifacts; even foreign kings with their armies... Most of them had perished and others now serve the Usurper instead, of their own free will or otherwise.

Yet, we believe... We still believe that someone, one day, will be able to set our souls free.





Grave Tower is a "rogue-lite" tactical RPG. Choose your adventurer, climb the tower and fight off monsters while building your team.

  • Recruit defeated enemies or sacrifice them for their abilities.
  • Replayability. No single run is the same. Encounters with enemies, random events and recruiting opportunities are different each time.
  • Deep tactical combat. Fights in the Tower are tough and brutal.
